channel.title: Face recognition on Carsten Schwemmer
channel.description: Recent content in Face recognition on Carsten Schwemmer

item.title: facerec
item.description: Provides an interface to the ‘Kairos’ Face Recognition API https://kairos.com/face-recognition-api. The API detects faces in images and returns estimates for demographics like gender, ethnicity and age.

item.title: google vision
item.description: Provides an interface to the ‘Kairos’ Face Recognition API https://kairos.com/face-recognition-api. The API detects faces in images and returns estimates for demographics like gender, ethnicity and age.
